meanings.definition: The act of holding or participating in a conference.
meanings.sent1: During the conferencings, everyone shared their ideas.
meanings.sent2: The conferencings brought together experts from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The conferencings turned into a lively debate about the future.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership skills shone during the conferencings.
meanings.sent5: The success of the project was attributed to effective conferencings.

meanings.definition: The practice of using technology to conduct meetings or discussions remotely.
meanings.sent1: With conferencings, we can connect with colleagues from afar.
meanings.sent2: Virtual conferencings have become more common in recent years.
meanings.sent3: The conferencings via video call sometimes had funny technical glitches.
meanings.sent4: In the world of conferencings, distance is no barrier.
meanings.sent5: Her favorite part of the job was organizing online conferencings.
